remarks: The value of a translation of an atom ` P ` not under the fiducial co-atom ` W ` , joined with trace.  Equation above Lemma C in [Crawley] p. 112.  (Contributed by NM, 25-May-2012.)
statement:
trljat.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
trljat.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
trljat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trljat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trljat.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trljat.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trljat2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( F ` P ) .\/ ( R ` F ) ) = ( P .\/ ( F ` P ) ) ) $.
